item.title: VapourSynth: pythonic alternative to avisynth
item.description: What do I know about VapourSynth http://www.vapoursynth.com/Â - website How to save data from VapourSynthYou need to use vspipe.exe from Vapour distributiveIt seems it returns raw data to stdout Render using ffmpegDon't know how jet Render using ImageMagick/convertDon't know how jet Image ReadingImage reading causes crash of AvsPmod, in which I using Vapoursynth[http://forum.doom9.org/showthread.php?t=166088](http://forum.doom9.org/showthread.php?t=166088)src: [https://github.com/chikuzen/vsimagereader](https://github.com/chikuzen/vsimagereader" target="_blank) Other AvsPmod - new version of AvsP. AvsP is a tabbed avs editor with convenient results preview.
